contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=255 |maint= |map=Route 255-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= |alternate_name= |length_km=129 |length_round=1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page (?), Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=North |direction_b=South |terminus_a=[[Image:qc132.svg|15px]] near [[Baie-du-Febvre, Quebec|Baie-du-Febvre]] |terminus_b=[[Image:qc214.svg|15px]] near [[Bury, Quebec|Bury]] |previous_type=QC |previous_route=253 |next_type=QC |next_route=257 |cities= [[Asbestos, Quebec|Asbestos]] |junction= [[Image:Quebec Autoroute 20.svg|15px]] & [[Image:qc122.svg|15px]] in Saint-Cyrille-de-Wendover <br> [[Image:qc116.svg|15px]] in Danville <br> [[Image:qc112.svg|15px]] in Bishopton <br> [[Image:qc108.svg|15px]] in Bury |}} '''Route 255''' is a north/south highway on the south shore of the [[St. Lawrence River]]. Its northern terminus is in [[Baie-du-Febvre, Quebec|Baie-du-Febvre]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 132|Route 132]] and its southern terminus is in [[Bury, Quebec|Bury]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 214]]. ==List of towns along Route 255== [[File:Route 255 (Baie-du-Febvre).jpg|thumb|right|Route 255 as viewed northbound near [[Baie-du-Febvre, Quebec]]]] * [[Baie-du-Febvre, Quebec|Baie-du-Febvre]] * Saint-Zephirin-de-Courval * Saint-Joachim-de-Courval * Saint-Cyrille-de-Wendover * Saint-Lucien * Saint-Felix-de-Kingsey * [[Danville, Quebec|Danville]] * [[Asbestos, Quebec|Asbestos]] * Wotton * Sainte-Camille * Bishopton * [[Bury, Quebec|Bury]] ==See also== * [[List of Quebec provincial highways]] ==References== <references/> == External links == * [http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&saddr=Rue+de+L%27%C3%89glise%2FRTE-255+%4046.137880,+-72.715420&daddr=7E+Rang%2FRTE-255+%4045.908964,+-72.327143+to:RTE-116%2FRTE-255+%4045.796820,+-72.017780+to:45.516211,-71.557732+to:RTE-108+%4045.487900,+-71.515330&hl=en&geocode=17797211564761759214,46.137880,-72.715420%3B13020632160614217802,45.908964,-72.327143%3B12113381848046740313,45.796820,-72.017780%3B9348820952099072502,45.487900,-71.515330&mra=dpe&mrcr=0&mrsp=3&sz=12&via=1,2,3&sll=45.553487,-71.49971&sspn=0.110588,0.30899&ie=UTF8&ll=45.83454,-72.029114&spn=0.880272,2.471924&z=9 Route 255] on Google Maps * [http://www.inforoutiere.qc.ca/fr/carte_routiere/index.asp Provincial Route Map (Courtesy of the Quebec Ministry of Transportation)] {{fr icon}} {{Secondary Highways in Quebec (200-series)}} [[Category:Quebec Routes|255]] [[Category:Asbestos, Quebec]] {{Quebec-road-stub}}
